content.text:
I'll analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step assembly instructions.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a figure with 5 main components:
  - A central vertical orange cylindrical column
  - A red U-shaped piece on top
  - Two yellow semi-cylindrical pieces on top of the red piece
  - Two orange triangular/wedge pieces at the base of the column

Block count: 5 pieces
Layers: 3 layers (base wedges, central column, top U-shape with yellow caps)

Required blocks from dictionary:
- Central column: Block #8 (orange cylinder)
- Top U-shaped piece: Block #3 (red U-shaped block)
- Yellow caps: Block #10 and #11 (identical yellow semi-cylindrical pieces)
- Base wedges: Block #14 and #16 (orange triangular wedges)

Assembly order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 14
    Step2: Move block with index 16
    Step3: Move block with index 8
    Step4: Move block with index 3
    Step5: Move block with index 10
    Step6: Move block with index 11
}

The assembly begins with the base wedges for stability, followed by the central column, then the U-shaped top piece, and finally the two yellow decorative caps on top.
